summary: PROBLEM WITH SHIFTING ON AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION FROM 2ND TO 3RD GEAR.  ENGINE RACES AND DOES NOT WANT TO GO INTO 3RD GEAR.  HAD TRANSMISSION REPAIRED, AND FOUND THAT THE 2ND GEAR CLUTCH PLATES HAD SEVERE PREMATURE WEAR, AND THE CLUTCH PLATES WERE GROOVED (NOT SMOOTH LIKE THE 3RD GEAR CLUTCH PLATES, AND NOT WHAT WAS SHOWN IN THE REPAIR MANUAL).  THE REPLACEMENT CLUTCH PLATES WERE SMOOTH, AS SHOWN IN THE REPAIR MANUAL. TS
